EPSConvergedReasonViewFromOptions

Processes command line options to determine if/how the EPS converged reason is to be viewed.

Synopsis

#include "slepceps.h" 
PetscErrorCode EPSConvergedReasonViewFromOptions(EPS eps)
Collective on eps

Input Parameter

eps  - the eigensolver context

See Also

EPSConvergedReasonView()

Location: src/eps/interface/epsview.c
